long_description: Every PROBAR Fuel snack bar delivers a full serving of fruit without a lot of fat or calories. Blend of dates, oats, chia seeds, cashews and fruit creates a superb flavor and texture. Chia seeds are high in Omega-3 acids, which may help promote cardiovasuclar and mental health. Fuel bars are gluten free, dairy free, vegan and organic. Only 2 grams of fat and 160 calories per bar. May contain traces of peanuts and/or tree nuts. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Every PROBAR Fuel snack bar delivers a full serving of fruit without a lot of fat or calories.
